reviewText: This recommended for those with Heavy Weapon intrerests.  World War I to present day Armour.  This is a DVD - TEXT edition.  Features latest design factors, Country or Origin and comments about efficiency of forward combat issues in numbers to thwart Infantry advancement.  The Tank is the main stay of a swift tactical advance.  Here is a historical account of the TANK..  A must read for beginner to "Soldier".  Facrts your Mother never told you!
